settings.question: Omega 3 Fish Oil & Vegan Omega-3 Supplements
settings.answer_body1: At Well Well Well  we offer a wide range of omega 3 fish oil supplements and pills online and in store. We even carry vegan omega 3 fish oil capsule substitutes. We have the best selection of vegan omega 3 and fish omega 3 supplements. Shop our extensive collection for your whole family.

settings.question: Are there vegetarian/vegan options for omega 3 fatty acid supplements?
settings.answer_body1: Yes, there are many vegan omega 3 supplement alternatives to fish oil. These plant based omega 3 supplements use DHA from ingredients like algae from the sea or even from the Ahiflower. Plant-derived omega-3s in vegan and vegetarian fish oil and supplements come in the form of alpha-linolenic acid (ALA). Shop our collection to find the best vegan and vegetarian omega 3 fish oil alternative.

settings.question: What are the benefits of taking omega 3 supplements?
settings.answer_body1: There are many benefits of taking natural fish oil supplements. The EPA and DHA contained within omega 3 fish oil can help with joint pain by helping your body overcome swelling and inflammation in the joints. It is also another great supplement to lower blood pressure naturally, brain health and memory. It is also one of the best supplements for skin as they can even serve to regulate the skin's oil production, improve balanced hydration, subdue breakouts and minimize signs of aging.

settings.question: What are the best omega 3 supplements to take?
settings.answer_body1: The best fish oil supplements to take depends on age, health and what you are trying to achieve with supplementation. If you want to increase and improve brain function consider taking omega 3 fish oil capsules with higher concentrations of DHA. If your goal is to help inflammation in the joints, a higher ratio of EPA to DHA would be a better choice. We also have the best vegan omega 3 supplement alternatives with EPA and DHA.

settings.question: What are the symptoms of omega 3 deficiency?
settings.answer_body1: Some symptoms of omega 3 deficiency can range from cognitive issues, like memory to skin issues like acne or dry patches. Many issues can come up when the diet is not rich in Omega 3’s. If we can not get enough natural food with omega 3, natural fish oil supplements benefit all ages and genders when taken on a consistent basis.

settings.question: Are omega 3 supplements safe for children and to take during pregnancy?
settings.answer_body1: There are great omega 3 supplements for children and mothers during pregnancy. These omega's are safe for pregnancy with regulated doses ensuring the best supplements for baby and children’s brain development. At Well Well Well we only carry the safest and best vegan fish oil substitutes and omega 3 fish oil supplements with the most benefits for the mother and child.

settings.question: What is the best omega 3 supplement?
settings.answer_body1: The best ratio of the EPA and DHA contained within omega 3 supplements is 2:1 - 2 parts EPA, which focuses on heart health, to 1 part DPA, which focuses on brain health.

settings.question: What are the three benefits of omega 3 fatty acids?
settings.answer_body1: The 3 most prominent benefits of omega 3 fatty acids contained within fish oil supplements are: brain health, heart health and lower blood pressure.

settings.question: Are there non fish oil supplements that have omega 3 for vegans?
settings.answer_body1: Yes. The correct vegan fish oil substitute are vegan omega 3 capsules. Vegan omega 3 supplements, such as our AOR Omega 3 Vegan Supplements, contain extracts from ingredients such as flax seed, chia seed and plant-based oils, which produce similar kinds of omega 3s to fish oil supplements. You can find many vegan alternatives to more common fish oil supplements at Well Well Well.

settings.question: How much omega 3 fish oil should you take daily?
settings.answer_body1: Our omega 3 fish oil supplement pills at Well Well Well may have different doses, depending on the additional ingredients and the main purpose of their use. Dosage recommendations will be clearly labeled on each product you buy and should be followed to receive full omega 3 fish oil benefits.
